content: Hello everyone,I'm new here, but I'm known on other forums (c.io,nulled,reddit) I'm looking to join your community and I hope you welcome me, I've gave away a lot on other forums so I might start doing it here tooNo rules just post your btc address I'll be rolling it in 1 week so around 24thCheers and have a nice dayOke so i took the advice and will be doing it from the block hash and ill start the count from 10 since ill be using the last 2 digits10-TheChin0s11-GazetaBitcoin12-CoinEraser13-ajiz13814-willi997415-Real-Duke16-c0ldbrewz17-cumakoff18-5tift19-julerz1220-malcovi221-Ratimov22-jokers1023-Smartprofit24-Xal0lex25-xandry26-bitzizzix27-bitbollo28-bullrun2020bro29-LoyceV30-xGennady31-shasan32-YOSHIE33-Danydee34-HeRetiK35-GrosWesh36-Woodie37-1miau38-libert1939-dbshck40-Koal-8441-blue Snow42-mocacinno43-NeuroticFish44-AHOYBRAUSE45-bct_ail46-hopenotlate47-DevilSlayer48-Hodlshi49-BitcoinGirl.Club50-mole081551-Doell52-FatFork53-d3nz54-Debilsumda55-mbe4856-iwantmyhomepaidwithbtc257-ETFbitcoin58-mgregg417787759-macson60-atchoum4461-seoincorporation62-DireWolfM1463-White pawn64-suzanne522365-japones66-mdzahed13467-Maddd68-onecall12369-BenCodie70-markzenn1171-Yabes72-xLays73-Porfirii74-shoreno75-Tigerheart302676-franckuestein77-papundekli2278-Haunebu79-pakhitheboss80-Mbitr81-rony0194182-Savemore83-codehtcmail84-abzy85-MarcoRg01186-Myleschetty87-MachineGam88-CryptoHeadlineNews89-md mohib90-91-92-93-94-95-96-97-98-99-INCASE THE LAST 2 DIGITS ARENT FILLED WE WILL WAIT TILL THE NEXT ONE we will wait till the hash is mined after this one 00000000000000000006b0f25523ef9a00fac656c7594e165697ddc5067beb6800000000000000000004256b47c615b199e839b5c4e586f21c7e891832b39db9 which is number 99 (NOT FILLED)00000000000000000005bee4da68306ecc95e6450a904054aa6f112908018fea which is 18 WINNER IS 5tift

comments.author: willi9974
comments.body: Hello and welcome here.bc1qzy6aqe5yxldrhrl8gxar96tuxpkzp7fr0u8lsaHope someone get the giveaway and best regardsWilliUPDATE:A small tip from my side to start with full transparency Thanks for the raffle on the $50 but something like this is a bit strange, you could have another account and send here your own BTC address the $50.I do not want to imply but a list of 1-99 or 1-50 or whatever and then draw with a block hash would be more transparent and generates more trust.--> no bad thinking, just a tip

comments.author: Rbah
comments.body: Quote from: willi9974 on January 17, 2023, 12:19:05 PMHello and welcome here.bc1qzy6aqe5yxldrhrl8gxar96tuxpkzp7fr0u8lsaHope someone get the giveaway and best regardsWilliUPDATE:A small tip from my side to start with full transparency Thanks for the raffle on the $50 but something like this is a bit strange, you could have another account and send here your own BTC address the $50.I do not want to imply but a list of 1-99 or 1-50 or whatever and then draw with a block hash would be more transparent and generates more trust.--> no bad thinking, just a tip   the way i was thinking is to add the user with his address in a wheel and who ever it lands on get the prize or i could ask someone trustworthy to roll it I don't mind
